title: Extreme Eternal Demon - Novel Updates
genre: Martial Arts   Psychological   Seinen   Supernatural   Tragedy   Xuanhuan
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Body Tempering   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Determined Protagonist   Distrustful Protagonist   Evil Protagonist   Harsh Training   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Male Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Possession   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Selfish Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Soul Power   Spear Wielder   Weak to Strong
author: Fallen Leaf Zhiliang   落叶知凉
description:
“Since Gods and Buddha are useless, I will claim my life from Heaven myself!”

The story is about a terminally ill person, spiritually reborn, embarking on an extreme path in pursuit of immortality.

He will be the God, killing Gods.

He will be the Buddha, killing the Buddha.>
